title: Cultivated land for RENT in Wilpattu
details:
37.5 Acre Land for RENT

Located at the border of Wilpattu National Wildlife Park, this 37.5-acre land provides a great opportunity for a tourism business or equally valuable for agricultural purpose. Nearest towns are Wanathavilluwa and Eluwankulama.

A pond is built that holds water for farming and the water supply is enough for about 3 months after rain. There’s a shallow well as well which needs cleaning up. 6-inch diameter tube well is also available.

3-phase electricity is available. No problem with water or electricity supply.

About 400 cashew plants are already planted.

A small house is available.

Call 0776359209 only if you are really interested. No time wasters, please.

Rental Price - Rs2,000 per acre per month
